job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen van backend software met C# .NET.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activity of writing backend software, a fundamental aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en implementeren van schaalbare oplossingen met Event Driven Architecture.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing solutions, especially scalable ones using architectural patterns like Event Driven Architecture, falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Toepassen van Event Storming en Domain Driven Design voor complexe processen.
job_tasks.justification: Event Storming and Domain Driven Design are methodologies and design principles used in the software development process for complex systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementeren van Azure Infrastructure Automation (Bicep/ARM templates).
job_tasks.justification: Implementing infrastructure automation using tools like Bicep/ARM templates is a part of modern software development and DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Jouw teams streven CI/CD na: zodra een item is ontwikkeld, getest en goedgekeurd, gaat het direct naar productie.
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD is a software development practice focused on automating the delivery pipeline.

job_tasks.phrase: Naast het omzetten van functionele stories naar goed werkende code, ben jij verantwoordelijk voor het technische ontwerp, systeemkwaliteit en naleving van organisatie-standaarden.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase encompasses core software development responsibilities including technical design, quality assurance, and adherence to standards.

job_tasks.phrase: Je borgt architectuur en helpt je team vooruit.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring architecture and supporting the team are integral parts of software development leadership and execution.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken met nieuwe technologieën zoals AI (LLM)
job_tasks.justification: Working with AI, specifically LLMs, implies interaction with or development of models, which falls under the Modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Jouw teams streven CI/CD na: zodra een item is ontwikkeld, getest en goedgekeurd, gaat het direct naar productie.
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD is a practice that bridges development and operations, specifically relevant to operations engineering for automated deployment.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementeren van Azure Infrastructure Automation (Bicep/ARM templates).
job_tasks.justification: Infrastructure automation is a key component of MLOps and broader operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Als Senior Backend Software Engineer ben je een drijvende kracht binnen een van onze development teams. Elk team bestaat uit 3 tot 7 personen met altijd een Product Owner, Ontwikkelaar(s) en Quality Engineer(s). Je werkt in sprints van 2 weken volgens agile-methodologieën zoals Scrum of Kanban.
job_tasks.justification: This provides context about team structure and agile methodologies, indicating an understanding of how technical work aligns with business processes.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken in een Agile omgeving (Scrum/Kanban) waarin we snel schakelen.
job_tasks.justification: Working in agile environments and collaborating effectively demonstrates an understanding of business-driven development processes.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken in een Agile omgeving (Scrum/Kanban) waarin we snel schakelen.
Ontwerpen en implementeren van schaalbare oplossingen
Als Senior Backend Software Engineer ben je een drijvende kracht binnen een van onze development teams.

classification.rationale: While the role mentions working with AI (LLM), the primary focus and overwhelming evidence point towards traditional backend software engineering responsibilities. The core tasks involve C#, .NET, Event Driven Architecture, and infrastructure automation, aligning more with a backend developer role than a specialist in predictive modeling or generative AI development.
